document_data.name: Burne Lyonsbane
document_data.mainbody:
'''Burne Lyonsbane''' was warrior and a member of the [[Lyosnbane]] family that hailed from their [[Lyonsbane Keep|familial keep]].

{{Quote|Yet those who are remembered in the annals of history never truly die. Instead they come to this place, the hall of heroes, where they look down on their loved ones and wait until they are joined by them.|An apparition of Burne, appearing to [[Kelemvor Lyonsbane]].}}
document_data.Personality: He was known to be a thoughtful and caring man.
document_data.Relationships:
Burne was one of the 6{{th}} generation of men born after [[Kyle Lyonsbane]], the mercenary whose actions cursed the Lyonsbane family with [[lycanthropy]].

He had a beloved nephew [[Kelemvor]], son of his brother [[Kendrel Lyonsbane|Kendrel]]. Kelemvor greatly admired his uncle, especially after being saved by him in youth.
document_data.History:
When Burne learned of the death of Kendrel, he went searching for the teenage Kelemvor. He and his adventuring band found the boy isolated and alone after six months in his [[werepanther]] form,

After his death, Burne's exploits were known and remembered by for years other warriors and men-at-arms.
